       <section id="dns-records-for-a-zone-notes" class="modunit" data-reactid="8197">
        <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="8198">
         <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="8199">
          <!-- react-text: 8200 -->DNS Records for a Zone
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 8201 --> Notes
          <!-- /react-text --></h3>
        </header>
        <table class="table striped notes" data-reactid="8202">
         <tbody data-reactid="8203">
          <tr data-reactid="8204">
           <td data-reactid="8205">If a zone's cname_setup_status is TRUE, you may only add A/AAAA and CNAME records for that zone</td>
          </tr>
          <tr data-reactid="8206">
           <td data-reactid="8207">When adding a CNAME record, it will not be added if there is an A or AAAA record with the same name</td>
          </tr>
          <tr data-reactid="8208">
           <td data-reactid="8209">When adding a A or AAAA record, it will not be added if there is an CNAME record with the same name</td>
          </tr>
          <tr data-reactid="8210">
           <td data-reactid="8211">A CNAME record's name may not match it's content</td>
          </tr>
          <tr data-reactid="8212">
           <td data-reactid="8213">You cannot add an NS record with the same name as any other record type</td>
          </tr>
          <tr data-reactid="8214">
           <td data-reactid="8215">You cannot add a record with the same name as any NS record</td>
          </tr>
          <tr data-reactid="8216">
           <td data-reactid="8217">Cloudflare will not begin serving DNS for a zone until the zone's nameservers are switched to Cloudflare nameservers at the zone's registrar</td>
          </tr>
          <tr data-reactid="8218">
           <td data-reactid="8219">DNS will continue to be served by Cloudflare for 20 days after a zone's nameservers are switched away from Cloudflare namservers</td>
          </tr>
          <tr data-reactid="8220">
           <td data-reactid="8221">When using unicode characters in domain names, they will be translated to punycode and as such, the length may end up being larger than what is passed into the API</td>
          </tr>
         </tbody>
        </table>
       </section>
      </article>

     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="8353">
         <!-- react-text: 8354 -->Response 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="8355">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="8356">
         <pre data-reactid="8357">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [
    {}
  ],
  "messages": [
    {}
  ],
  "result": {
    "method": "GET",
    "host_name": "www.example.com",
    "http_status": 200,
    "railgun": "on",
    "url": "https://www.cloudflare.com",
    "response_status": "200 OK",
    "protocol": "HTTP/1.1",

      <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="8430">
       <header data-reactid="8431">
        <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="zone-analytics" data-reactid="8432"></div>
        <h2 data-reactid="8433">Zone Analytics</h2>
        <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="8434">Analytics data for a zone</h4>
       </header>
       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="8435">
        <a class="anchor" id="zone-analytics-properties" data-reactid="8436">zone-analytics</a>
        <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="8437">
         <h4 data-reactid="8438">
          <!-- react-text: 8439 -->Object definition
          <!-- /react-text --><span data-reactid="8440">s</span></h4>
         <p data-reactid="8441">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
         <p data-reactid="8442"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="8443"><span class="verb" data-reactid="8444">Show</span>
           <!-- react-text: 8445 --> 
           <!-- /react-text -->
           <!-- react-text: 8446 -->definition
           <!-- /react-text --><span data-reactid="8447">s</span></a></p>
        </header>
       </section>
       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="8448">
        <a class="anchor2" id="zone-analytics-dashboard" data-reactid="8449">zone-analytics-dashboard</a>
        <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="8450">
         <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="8451"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="8452">GET</span>
          <!-- react-text: 8453 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 8454 -->Dashboard
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 8455 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 8456 --> 
          <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="8457">
           <!-- react-text: 8458 -->permission needed: 
           <!-- /react-text -->
           <!-- react-text: 8459 -->#analytics:read
           <!-- /react-text --></small>
          <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="8460">
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8461"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8462">free</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="8463"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8464"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8465">pro</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="8466"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8467"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8468">business</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="8469"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8470"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8471">enterprise</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="8472"></div></li>
          </ul></h3>
         <div data-reactid="8473">
          <p>The dashboard view provides both totals and timeseries data for the given zone and time period across the entire Cloudflare network.</p> 
         </div>
         <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="8474">
          <!-- react-text: 8475 -->GET
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 8476 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 8477 -->zones/:zone_identifier/analytics/dashboard
          <!-- /react-text --></pre>
        </div>
        <div data-reactid="8478">
         <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="8479"><em data-reactid="8480">Optional</em>
          <!-- react-text: 8481 --> parameters
          <!-- /react-text --></h4>
         <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="8482">
          <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="8483">
           <thead data-reactid="8484">
            <tr data-reactid="8485">
             <td data-reactid="8486">
              <!-- react-text: 8487 -->Name 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="8488">/type</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="8489">
              <!-- react-text: 8490 -->Description 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="8491">/example</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="8492">Constraints</td>
            </tr>
           </thead>
           <tbody data-reactid="8493">
            <tr data-reactid="8494">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="8495"><strong data-reactid="8496">since</strong><br data-reactid="8497"><small data-reactid="8498"><em data-reactid="8499">
                <!-- react-text: 8500 -->string
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 8501 -->integer
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="8502">
              <div data-reactid="8503">
               <p>The (inclusive) beginning of the requested time frame. This value can be a negative integer representing the number of minutes in the past relative to time the request is made, or can be an absolute timestamp that conforms to RFC 3339. At this point in time, it cannot exceed a time in the past greater than one year.</p> 
               <p>Ranges that the Cloudflare web application provides will provide the following period length for each point:</p> 
               <ul> 
                <li>Last 60 minutes (from -59 to -1): 1 minute resolution</li> 
                <li>Last 7 hours (from -419 to -60): 15 minutes resolution</li> 
                <li>Last 15 hours (from -899 to -420): 30 minutes resolution</li> 
                <li>Last 72 hours (from -4320 to -900): 1 hour resolution</li> 
                <li>Older than 3 days (-525600 to -4320): 1 day resolution</li> 
               </ul> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="8504">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="8505"><code data-reactid="8506">"2015-01-01T12:23:00Z"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="8507">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="8508">
               <li data-reactid="8509">default value: -10080</li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="8510">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="8511"><strong data-reactid="8512">until</strong><br data-reactid="8513"><small data-reactid="8514"><em data-reactid="8515">
                <!-- react-text: 8516 -->string
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 8517 -->integer
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="8518">
              <div data-reactid="8519">
               <p>The (exclusive) end of the requested time frame. This value can be a negative integer representing the number of minutes in the past relative to time the request is made, or can be an absolute timestamp that conforms to RFC 3339. If omitted, the time of the request is used.</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="8520">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="8521"><code data-reactid="8522">"2015-01-02T12:23:00Z"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="8523">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="8524">
               <li data-reactid="8525">default value: 0</li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="8526">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="8527"><strong data-reactid="8528">continuous</strong><br data-reactid="8529"><small data-reactid="8530"><em data-reactid="8531">
                <!-- react-text: 8532 -->boolean
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="8533">
              <div data-reactid="8534">
               <p>When set to true, and when <code>since</code> is a relative timestamp (i.e. a negative number, representing the number of seconds to look back), the API will move the requested time window backward, up to a bounded number of seconds, until it finds a complete, continuous region of data. This flag thus should only be true when trying to get the most recently arrived, but also completely aggregated, data.</p> 
               <p>The API will also return data when <code>continuous</code> is true and when <code>until</code> is set, or when both <code>since</code> and <code>until</code> are absolute timestamps. However, due to the underlying behaviour of <code>continuous=true</code>, which regresses the time window if data is not available, the users must beware that with these parameters, the API response <em>may not represent the requested time window</em>. We thus advise against using both <code>continuous=true</code> and absolute timestamps.</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="8535">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="8536"><code data-reactid="8537">true</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="8538">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="8539">
               <li data-reactid="8540">default value: true</li>
               <li data-reactid="8541">valid values: (true,false)</li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="8542">
         <!-- react-text: 8543 -->cURL 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="8544">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="8545">
         <pre data-reactid="8546">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/analytics/dashboard?since=2015-01-01T12:23:00Z&amp;until=2015-01-02T12:23:00Z&amp;continuous=true" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="651016001725001d04081509004b060a08">[email&nbsp;protected]</a>" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
        </div>

       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="8552">
        <a class="anchor2" id="zone-analytics-analytics-by-co-locations" data-reactid="8553">zone-analytics-analytics-by-co-locations</a>
        <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="8554">
         <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="8555"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="8556">GET</span>
          <!-- react-text: 8557 -->

          <!-- react-text: 8558 -->Analytics by Co-locations
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 8559 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->

            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="8576"></div></li>
          </ul></h3>
         <div data-reactid="8577">
          <p>This view provides a breakdown of analytics data by datacenter. Note: This is available to Enterprise customers only.</p> 
         </div>
         <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="8578">
          <!-- react-text: 8579 -->GET
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 8580 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 8581 -->zones/:zone_identifier/analytics/colos
          <!-- /react-text --></pre>
        </div>
        <div data-reactid="8582">
         <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="8583"><em data-reactid="8584">Optional</em>
          <!-- react-text: 8585 --> parameters
          <!-- /react-text --></h4>
         <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="8586">
          <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="8587">
           <thead data-reactid="8588">
            <tr data-reactid="8589">
             <td data-reactid="8590">
              <!-- react-text: 8591 -->Name 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="8592">/type</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="8593">
              <!-- react-text: 8594 -->Description 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="8595">/example</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="8596">Constraints</td>
            </tr>
           </thead>
           <tbody data-reactid="8597">
            <tr data-reactid="8598">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="8599"><strong data-reactid="8600">since</strong><br data-reactid="8601"><small data-reactid="8602"><em data-reactid="8603">
                <!-- react-text: 8604 -->string
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 8605 -->integer
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="8606">
              <div data-reactid="8607">
               <p>The (inclusive) beginning of the requested time frame. This value can be a negative integer representing the number of minutes in the past relative to time the request is made, or can be an absolute timestamp that conforms to RFC 3339. At this point in time, it cannot exceed a time in the past greater than one year.</p> 
               <p>Ranges that the Cloudflare web application provides will provide the following period length for each point:</p> 
               <ul> 
                <li>Last 60 minutes (from -59 to -1): 1 minute resolution</li> 
                <li>Last 7 hours (from -419 to -60): 15 minutes resolution</li> 
                <li>Last 15 hours (from -899 to -420): 30 minutes resolution</li> 
                <li>Last 72 hours (from -4320 to -900): 1 hour resolution</li> 
                <li>Older than 3 days (-525600 to -4320): 1 day resolution</li> 
               </ul> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="8608">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="8609"><code data-reactid="8610">"2015-01-01T12:23:00Z"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="8611">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="8612">
               <li data-reactid="8613">default value: -10080</li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="8614">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="8615"><strong data-reactid="8616">until</strong><br data-reactid="8617"><small data-reactid="8618"><em data-reactid="8619">
                <!-- react-text: 8620 -->string
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 8621 -->integer
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="8622">
              <div data-reactid="8623">
               <p>The (exclusive) end of the requested time frame. This value can be a negative integer representing the number of minutes in the past relative to time the request is made, or can be an absolute timestamp that conforms to RFC 3339. If omitted, the time of the request is used.</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="8624">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="8625"><code data-reactid="8626">"2015-01-02T12:23:00Z"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="8627">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="8628">
               <li data-reactid="8629">default value: 0</li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="8630">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="8631"><strong data-reactid="8632">continuous</strong><br data-reactid="8633"><small data-reactid="8634"><em data-reactid="8635">
                <!-- react-text: 8636 -->boolean
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="8637">
              <div data-reactid="8638">
               <p>When set to true, and when <code>since</code> is a relative timestamp (i.e. a negative number, representing the number of seconds to look back), the API will move the requested time window backward, up to a bounded number of seconds, until it finds a complete, continuous region of data. This flag thus should only be true when trying to get the most recently arrived, but also completely aggregated, data.</p> 
               <p>The API will also return data when <code>continuous</code> is true and when <code>until</code> is set, or when both <code>since</code> and <code>until</code> are absolute timestamps. However, due to the underlying behaviour of <code>continuous=true</code>, which regresses the time window if data is not available, the users must beware that with these parameters, the API response <em>may not represent the requested time window</em>. We thus advise against using both <code>continuous=true</code> and absolute timestamps.</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="8639">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="8640"><code data-reactid="8641">true</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="8642">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="8643">
               <li data-reactid="8644">default value: true</li>
               <li data-reactid="8645">valid values: (true,false)</li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="8646">
         <!-- react-text: 8647 -->cURL 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="8648">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="8649">
         <pre data-reactid="8650">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/analytics/colos?since=2015-01-01T12:23:00Z&amp;until=2015-01-02T12:23:00Z&amp;continuous=true" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="98edebfdead8fde0f9f5e8f4fdb6fbf7f5">[email&nbsp;protected]</a>" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="8651">
         <!-- react-text: 8652 -->Response 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="8653">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="8654">
         <pre data-reactid="8655">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [
    {}
  ],
  "messages": [

        </div>
       </section>
      </article>
      <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="8656">
       <header data-reactid="8657">
        <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="dns-analytics" data-reactid="8658"></div>
        <h2 data-reactid="8659">DNS Analytics</h2>
        <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="8660">Analytics data for a zone.</h4>
       </header>
       <section data-reactid="8661">
        <a class="anchor" id="dns-analytics-properties" data-reactid="8662">
         <!-- react-text: 8663 -->$
         <!-- /react-text -->
         <!-- react-text: 8664 -->dns-analytics
         <!-- /react-text --></a>
        <h3 data-reactid="8665">Metrics</h3>
        <p data-reactid="8666">
         <!-- react-text: 8667 -->A metric is a numerical value that is based on an attribute of the data, for example
         <!-- /react-text -->
         <!-- react-text: 8668 --> 
         <!-- /react-text -->
         <!-- react-text: 8669 -->a query count.
         <!-- /react-text --></p>
        <p data-reactid="8670">
         <!-- react-text: 8671 -->In API requests, 
         <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8672">metrics</code>
         <!-- react-text: 8673 --> are set in the metrics parameter. If you
         <!-- /react-text -->
         <!-- react-text: 8674 --> 
         <!-- /react-text -->
         <!-- react-text: 8675 -->need to list multiple metrics, separate them with commas.
         <!-- /react-text --></p>
        <table class="cf-table cf-table--bordered" data-reactid="8676">
         <thead class="cf-table__head" data-reactid="8677">
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8678">
           <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="8679">Metric</th>
           <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="8680">Name</th>
           <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="8681">Example</th>
           <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="8682">Unit</th>
          </tr>
         </thead>
         <tbody class="cf-table__body" data-reactid="8683">
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8684">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8685">queryCount</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8686">Query count</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8687">1000</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8688">Count</td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8689">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8690">uncachedCount</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8691">Uncached query count</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8692">1</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8693">Count</td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8694">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8695">staleCount</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8696">Stale query count</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8697">1</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8698">Count</td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8699">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8700">responseTimeAvg</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8701">Average response time</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8702">1.0</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8703">Time in milliseconds.</td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8704">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8705">responseTimeMedian</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8706">Median response time</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8707">1.0</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8708">Time in milliseconds.</td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8709">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8710">responseTime90th</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8711">90th percentile response time</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8712">1.0</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8713">Time in milliseconds.</td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8714">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8715">responseTime99th</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8716">99th percentile response time</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8717">1.0</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8718">Time in milliseconds.</td>
          </tr>
         </tbody>
        </table>
        <h3 data-reactid="8719">Dimensions</h3>
        <p data-reactid="8720">Dimensions can be used to break down the data by given attributes.</p>
        <p data-reactid="8721">
         <!-- react-text: 8722 -->In API requests, dimensions are set in the 
         <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8723">dimensions</code>
         <!-- react-text: 8724 --> parameter.
         <!-- /react-text -->
         <!-- react-text: 8725 --> 
         <!-- /react-text -->
         <!-- react-text: 8726 -->If you need to list multiple dimensions, separate them with commas.
         <!-- /react-text --></p>
        <table class="cf-table cf-table--bordered" data-reactid="8727">
         <thead class="cf-table__head" data-reactid="8728">
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8729">
           <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="8730">Dimension</th>
           <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="8731">Name</th>
           <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="8732">Example</th>
           <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="8733">Notes</th>
          </tr>
         </thead>
         <tbody class="cf-table__body" data-reactid="8734">
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8735">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8736">queryName</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8737">Query Name</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8738"><code data-reactid="8739">example.com</code></td>
           <td data-reactid="8740"></td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8741">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8742">queryType</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8743">Query Type</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8744"><code data-reactid="8745">AAAA</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8746">
            <!-- react-text: 8747 -->Types 
            <!-- /react-text --><a href="http://www.iana.org/assignments/dns-parameters/dns-parameters.xhtml#dns-parameters-4" data-reactid="8748">defined by IANA</a>
            <!-- react-text: 8749 -->, unknown types are empty.
            <!-- /react-text --></td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8750">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8751">responseCode</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8752">Response Code</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8753"><code data-reactid="8754">NOERROR</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8755">
            <!-- react-text: 8756 -->Response codes 
            <!-- /react-text --><a href="http://www.iana.org/assignments/dns-parameters/dns-parameters.xhtml#dns-parameters-6" data-reactid="8757">defined by IANA</a>
            <!-- react-text: 8758 --> (always uppercase).
            <!-- /react-text --></td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8759">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8760">responseCached</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8761">Response Cached</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8762"><code data-reactid="8763">Cached</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8764">
            <!-- react-text: 8765 -->Either 
            <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8766">Cached</code>
            <!-- react-text: 8767 --> or 
            <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8768">Uncached</code>
            <!-- react-text: 8769 -->.
            <!-- /react-text --></td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8770">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8771">coloName</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8772">Colo Name</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8773">SJC</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8774">PoP code.</td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8775">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8776">origin</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8777">Origin</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8778"><code data-reactid="8779">2001:db8::1</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8780">
            <!-- react-text: 8781 -->Origin used to resolve the query (empty if N/A or if the query was
            <!-- /react-text -->
            <!-- react-text: 8782 --> 
            <!-- /react-text -->
            <!-- react-text: 8783 -->answered from cache).
            <!-- /react-text --></td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8784">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8785">dayOfWeek</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8786">Day Of Week</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8787"><code data-reactid="8788">1</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8789">Break down by day of week, (Monday is 1, and Sunday is 7).</td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8790">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8791">tcp</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8792">TCP</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8793"><code data-reactid="8794">1</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8795">
            <!-- react-text: 8796 -->Either 
            <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8797">1</code>
            <!-- react-text: 8798 --> or 
            <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8799">0</code>
            <!-- react-text: 8800 --> depending on the protocol used.
            <!-- /react-text --></td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8801">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8802">ipVersion</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8803">IP Version</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8804"><code data-reactid="8805">6</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8806">
            <!-- react-text: 8807 -->IP protocol version used (currently 
            <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8808">4</code>
            <!-- react-text: 8809 --> or 
            <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8810">6</code>
            <!-- react-text: 8811 -->).
            <!-- /react-text --></td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8812">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8813">querySizeBucket</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8814">Query Size Bucket</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8815"><code data-reactid="8816">16-31</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8817">Query size bucket by multiples of 16.</td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8818">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8819">responseSizeBucket</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8820">Response Size Bucket</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8821"><code data-reactid="8822">16-31</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8823">Response size bucket by multiples of 16.</td>
          </tr>
         </tbody>
        </table>
        <h3 data-reactid="8824">Filters</h3>
        <p data-reactid="8825">
         <!-- react-text: 8826 -->A filter uses the form: 
         <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8827">dimension operator expression</code></p>
        <p data-reactid="8828">In this syntax:</p>
        <ul data-reactid="8829">
         <li data-reactid="8830"><strong data-reactid="8831">name</strong>
          <!-- react-text: 8832 -->  the name of the dimension or metric to filter on.
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 8833 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 8834 -->For example: 
          <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8835">queryName</code></li>
         <li data-reactid="8836"><strong data-reactid="8837">operator</strong>
          <!-- react-text: 8838 -->  defines the type of filter match to use. Operators
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 8839 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 8840 -->are specific to either dimensions or metrics.
          <!-- /react-text --></li>
         <li data-reactid="8841"><strong data-reactid="8842">expression</strong>
          <!-- react-text: 8843 -->  states the values to be included in or excluded
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 8844 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 8845 -->from the results. Expressions use regular expression syntax
          <!-- /react-text --></li>
        </ul>
        <h3 data-reactid="8846">Filter Operators</h3>
        <table class="cf-table cf-table--bordered" data-reactid="8847">
         <thead class="cf-table__head" data-reactid="8848">
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8849">
           <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="8850">Operator</th>
           <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="8851">Name</th>
           <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="8852">Example</th>
           <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="8853">Notes</th>
           <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="8854">URL Encoded</th>
          </tr>
         </thead>
         <tbody class="cf-table__body" data-reactid="8855">
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8856">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8857"><code data-reactid="8858">==</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8859">Equals</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8860"><code data-reactid="8861">queryName==example.com</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8862">
            <!-- react-text: 8863 -->Return results where queryName is exactly 
            <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8864">example.com</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8865"><code data-reactid="8866">%3D%3D</code></td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8867">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8868"><code data-reactid="8869">!=</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8870">Does not equal</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8871"><code data-reactid="8872">responseCode!=NOERROR</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8873">
            <!-- react-text: 8874 -->Return results where response code is different from 
            <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8875">NOERROR</code>
            <!-- react-text: 8876 -->.
            <!-- /react-text --></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8877"><code data-reactid="8878">!%3D</code></td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8879">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8880"><code data-reactid="8881">&gt;</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8882">Greater than</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8883"><code data-reactid="8884">queryCount&gt;1000</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8885">
            <!-- react-text: 8886 -->Return results where query count is higher than 
            <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8887">1000</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8888"><code data-reactid="8889">%3E</code></td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8890">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8891"><code data-reactid="8892">&lt;</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8893">Less than</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8894"><code data-reactid="8895">queryCount&lt;1000</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8896">
            <!-- react-text: 8897 -->Return results where query count is lower than 
            <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8898">1000</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8899"><code data-reactid="8900">%3C</code></td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8901">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8902"><code data-reactid="8903">&gt;=</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8904">Greater than or equal to</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8905"><code data-reactid="8906">queryCount&gt;=1000</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8907">
            <!-- react-text: 8908 -->Return results where query count is higher than or equal to 
            <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8909">1000</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8910"><code data-reactid="8911">%3E%3D</code></td>
          </tr>
          <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="8912">
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8913"><code data-reactid="8914">&lt;=</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8915">Less than or equal to</td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8916"><code data-reactid="8917">queryCount&lt;=1000</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8918">
            <!-- react-text: 8919 -->Return results where query count is lower than or equal to 
            <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8920">1000</code></td>
           <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="8921"><code data-reactid="8922">%3C%3D</code></td>
          </tr>
         </tbody>
        </table>
        <h3 data-reactid="8923">Combining Filters</h3>
        <p data-reactid="8924">
         <!-- react-text: 8925 -->Filters can be combined using 
         <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8926">OR</code>
         <!-- react-text: 8927 --> and 
         <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8928">AND</code>
         <!-- react-text: 8929 --> boolean logic. 
         <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8930">AND</code>
         <!-- react-text: 8931 --> takes precedence
         <!-- /react-text -->
         <!-- react-text: 8932 --> 
         <!-- /react-text -->
         <!-- react-text: 8933 -->over OR in all the expressions.
         <!-- /react-text --></p>
        <h4 data-reactid="8934">OR</h4>
        <p data-reactid="8935">
         <!-- react-text: 8936 -->The 
         <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8937">OR</code>
         <!-- react-text: 8938 --> operator is defined using a comma (
         <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8939">,</code>
         <!-- react-text: 8940 -->) or 
         <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8941">OR</code>
         <!-- react-text: 8942 --> 
         <!-- /react-text -->
         <!-- react-text: 8943 -->keyword surrounded by whitespace.
         <!-- /react-text --></p>
        <p data-reactid="8944">Examples:</p>
        <ul data-reactid="8945">
         <li data-reactid="8946">
          <!-- react-text: 8947 -->Response code is either 
          <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8948">NOERROR</code>
          <!-- react-text: 8949 --> or 
          <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8950">NXDOMAIN</code>
          <!-- react-text: 8951 -->:
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 8952 --> 
          <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8953">responseCode==NOERROR,responseCode==NXDOMAIN</code></li>
         <li data-reactid="8954">
          <!-- react-text: 8955 -->Queries in either 
          <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8956">SJC</code>
          <!-- react-text: 8957 --> or 
          <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8958">LAX</code>
          <!-- react-text: 8959 -->:
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 8960 --> 
          <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8961">coloName==SJC OR coloName==LAX</code></li>
        </ul>
        <h4 data-reactid="8962">AND</h4>
        <p data-reactid="8963">
         <!-- react-text: 8964 -->The 
         <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8965">AND</code>
         <!-- react-text: 8966 --> operator is defined using a semicolon (
         <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8967">;</code>
         <!-- react-text: 8968 -->)
         <!-- /react-text -->
         <!-- react-text: 8969 --> 
         <!-- /react-text -->
         <!-- react-text: 8970 -->or 
         <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8971">AND</code>
         <!-- react-text: 8972 --> keyword surrounded by whitespace.
         <!-- /react-text --></p>
        <p data-reactid="8973">Examples:</p>
        <ul data-reactid="8974">
         <li data-reactid="8975">
          <!-- react-text: 8976 -->Response code is 
          <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8977">NOERROR</code>
          <!-- react-text: 8978 --> and query type is 
          <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8979">AAAA:</code>
          <!-- react-text: 8980 --> 
          <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8981">responseCode==NOERROR;queryType==AAAA</code></li>
         <li data-reactid="8982"><code data-reactid="8983">AAAA</code>
          <!-- react-text: 8984 --> queries in 
          <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8985">SJC</code>
          <!-- react-text: 8986 -->:
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 8987 --> 
          <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="8988">queryType==AAAA AND coloName==SJC</code></li>
        </ul>
       </section>
       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="8989">
        <a class="anchor2" id="dns-analytics-table" data-reactid="8990">dns-analytics-table</a>
        <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="8991">
         <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="8992"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="8993">GET</span>

          <!-- react-text: 8995 -->Table

          <!-- react-text: 8996 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 8997 -->

         <div data-reactid="8998">
          <p>Retrieves a list of summarised aggregate metrics over a given time period.</p>

                <!-- react-text: 9113 -->string
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="9114">
              <div data-reactid="9115">
               <p>Segmentation filter in 'attribute operator value' format</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="9116">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="9117"><code data-reactid="9118">"responseCode==NOERROR"</code></small>
              </div></td>

                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="9128">
              <div data-reactid="9129">
               <p>Limit number of returned metrics, default is 100</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="9130">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="9131"><code data-reactid="9132">100</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="9133">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="9134"></ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>

        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="9135">
         <!-- react-text: 9136 -->cURL 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="9137">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="9138">
         <pre data-reactid="9139">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/dns_analytics/report?dimensions=responseCode,queryName&amp;metrics=queryCount,responseTimeAvg&amp;sort=+responseCode,-queryName&amp;filters=responseCode==NOERROR&amp;since=2016-11-11T12:00:00Z&amp;until=2016-11-11T13:00:00Z&amp;limit=100" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="93e6e0f6e1d3f6ebf2fee3fff6bdf0fcfe">[email&nbsp;protected]</a>" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="9140">
         <!-- react-text: 9141 -->Response 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="9142">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="9143">
         <pre data-reactid="9144">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "data": {
      "dimensions": [
        {
          "name": "NODATA"
        }
      ],
      "metrics": [
        1.5,
        2
      ]
    },
    "totals": {
      "queryCount": 1000,
      "responseTimeAvg": 1
    },
    "min": {
      "queryCount": 1000,
      "responseTimeAvg": 1
    },
    "max": {
      "queryCount": 1000,
      "responseTimeAvg": 1
    }
  },
  "query": {
    "dimensions": [
      "responseCode",
      "queryName"
    ],
    "metrics": [
      "queryCount",
      "responseTimeAvg"
    ],
    "sort": [
      "+responseCode",
      "-queryName"
    ],
    "filters": "responseCode==NOERROR",
    "since": "2016-11-11T12:00:00Z",
    "until": "2016-11-11T13:00:00Z",
    "limit": 100
  }
}</pre>
        </div>
       </section>

              </div></td>

                <!-- react-text: 9223 -->string
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="9224">
              <div data-reactid="9225">
               <p>Segmentation filter in 'attribute operator value' format</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="9226">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="9227"><code data-reactid="9228">"responseCode==NOERROR"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="9229">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="9230"></ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="9231">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="9232"><strong data-reactid="9233">since</strong><br data-reactid="9234"><small data-reactid="9235"><em data-reactid="9236">
                <!-- react-text: 9237 -->string
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 9238 --> (date-time)
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="9239">
              <div data-reactid="9240">
               <p>Start date and time of requesting data period in the ISO8601 format</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="9241">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="9242"><code data-reactid="9243">"2016-11-11T12:00:00Z"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="9244">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="9245"></ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="9246">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="9247"><strong data-reactid="9248">until</strong><br data-reactid="9249"><small data-reactid="9250"><em data-reactid="9251">
                <!-- react-text: 9252 -->string
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 9253 --> (date-time)
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="9254">
              <div data-reactid="9255">
               <p>End date and time of requesting data period in the ISO8601 format</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="9256">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="9257"><code data-reactid="9258">"2016-11-11T13:00:00Z"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="9259">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="9260"></ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="9261">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="9262"><strong data-reactid="9263">limit</strong><br data-reactid="9264"><small data-reactid="9265"><em data-reactid="9266">
                <!-- react-text: 9267 -->integer
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="9268">
              <div data-reactid="9269">
               <p>Limit number of returned metrics, default is 100</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="9270">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="9271"><code data-reactid="9272">100</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="9273">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="9274"></ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="9275">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="9276"><strong data-reactid="9277">time_delta</strong><br data-reactid="9278"><small data-reactid="9279"><em data-reactid="9280"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="9281">
              <div data-reactid="9282">
               <p>Unit of time to group data by</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="9283">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="9284"><code data-reactid="9285">"hour"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="9286">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="9287">
               <li data-reactid="9288">
                <!-- react-text: 9289 -->valid values: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 9290 -->all, auto, year, quarter, month, week, day, hour, dekaminute, minute
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="9291">
         <!-- react-text: 9292 -->cURL 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="9293">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="9294">
         <pre data-reactid="9295">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/dns_analytics/report/bytime?dimensions=responseCode,queryName&amp;metrics=queryCount,responseTimeAvg&amp;sort=+responseCode,-queryName&amp;filters=responseCode==NOERROR&amp;since=2016-11-11T12:00:00Z&amp;until=2016-11-11T13:00:00Z&amp;limit=100&amp;time_delta=hour" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="4c393f293e0c29342d213c2029622f2321">[email&nbsp;protected]</a>" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="9296">
         <!-- react-text: 9297 -->Response 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="9298">(example)</small></h5>

         <pre data-reactid="9300">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "data": {
      "dimensions": [
        {
          "name": "NODATA"
        }
      ],
      "metrics": [
        [
          1.5,
          2
        ],
        [
          2.3,
          1.5
        ]
      ]
    },
    "totals": {
      "queryCount": 1000,
      "responseTimeAvg": 1
    },
    "min": {
      "queryCount": 1000,
      "responseTimeAvg": 1
    },
    "max": {
      "queryCount": 1000,
      "responseTimeAvg": 1
    }
  },
  "query": {
    "dimensions": [
      "responseCode",
      "queryName"
    ],
    "metrics": [
      "queryCount",
      "responseTimeAvg"
    ],
    "sort": [
      "+responseCode",
      "-queryName"
    ],
    "filters": "responseCode==NOERROR",
    "since": "2016-11-11T12:00:00Z",
    "until": "2016-11-11T13:00:00Z",
    "limit": 100,
    "time_delta": "hour"
  }
}</pre>
        </div>
       </section>

       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="9533">
        <a class="anchor2" id="railgun-get-zones-connected-to-a-railgun" data-reactid="9534">railgun-get-zones-connected-to-a-railgun</a>

        <a class="anchor2" id="railgun-enable-or-disable-a-railgun" data-reactid="9571">railgun-enable-or-disable-a-railgun</a>
        <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="9572">
         <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="9573"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="9574">PATCH</span>
          <!-- react-text: 9575 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 9576 -->Enable or disable a Railgun
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 9577 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 9578 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="9579">
           <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="9580"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9581">free</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="9582"></div></li>
           <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="9583"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9584">pro</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="9585"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9586"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9587">business</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9588"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9589"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9590">enterprise</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9591"></div></li>
          </ul></h3>
         <div data-reactid="9592">
          <p>Enable or disable a Railgun for all zones connected to it</p> 
         </div>
         <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="9593">
          <!-- react-text: 9594 -->PATCH
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 9595 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 9596 -->railguns/:identifier
          <!-- /react-text --></pre>
        </div>
        <div data-reactid="9597">
         <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="9598"><em data-reactid="9599">Required</em>
          <!-- react-text: 9600 --> parameters
          <!-- /react-text --></h4>
         <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="9601">
          <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="9602">
           <thead data-reactid="9603">
            <tr data-reactid="9604">
             <td data-reactid="9605">
              <!-- react-text: 9606 -->Name 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="9607">/type</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="9608">
              <!-- react-text: 9609 -->Description 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="9610">/example</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="9611">Constraints</td>
            </tr>
           </thead>
           <tbody data-reactid="9612">
            <tr data-reactid="9613">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="9614"><strong data-reactid="9615">enabled</strong><br data-reactid="9616"><small data-reactid="9617"><em data-reactid="9618">
                <!-- react-text: 9619 -->boolean
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="9620">
              <div data-reactid="9621">
               <p>Flag to determine if the Railgun is accepting connections</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="9622">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="9623"><code data-reactid="9624">true</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="9625">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="9626">
               <li data-reactid="9627">default value: false</li>
               <li data-reactid="9628">valid values: (true,false)</li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>
        </div>

     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \

        </div>

        </div>

         <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="9805"><em data-reactid="9806">Required</em>
          <!-- react-text: 9807 --> parameters
          <!-- /react-text --></h4>
         <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="9808">
          <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="9809">
           <thead data-reactid="9810">
            <tr data-reactid="9811">
             <td data-reactid="9812">
              <!-- react-text: 9813 -->Name 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="9814">/type</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="9815">
              <!-- react-text: 9816 -->Description 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="9817">/example</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="9818">Constraints</td>
            </tr>
           </thead>
           <tbody data-reactid="9819">
            <tr data-reactid="9820">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="9821"><strong data-reactid="9822">url</strong><br data-reactid="9823"><small data-reactid="9824"><em data-reactid="9825">
                <!-- react-text: 9826 -->string
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 9827 --> (url)
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="9828">
              <div data-reactid="9829">
               <p>A URL that is associated with the Custom Page.</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="9830">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="9831"><code data-reactid="9832">"http://www.example.com"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="9833">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="9834">
               <li data-reactid="9835">default value: </li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="9836">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="9837"><strong data-reactid="9838">state</strong><br data-reactid="9839"><small data-reactid="9840"><em data-reactid="9841"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="9842">
              <div data-reactid="9843">
               <p>The Custom Page state</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="9844">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="9845"><code data-reactid="9846">"default"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="9847">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="9848">
               <li data-reactid="9849">
                <!-- react-text: 9850 -->valid values: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 9851 -->default, customized
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="9852">
         <!-- react-text: 9853 -->cURL 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="9854">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="9855">
         <pre data-reactid="9856">curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/custom_pages/basic_challenge" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="7a0f091f083a1f021b170a161f54191517">[email&nbsp;protected]</a>" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"url":"http://www.example.com","state":"default"}'</pre>
        </div>

         <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="9970"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="9971">POST</span>

          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 9973 -->Create SSL configuration
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 9974 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->

           <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="9980"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9981">free</h6>

            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9991"></div></li>
          </ul></h3>
         <div data-reactid="9992">
          <p>Upload a new SSL certificate for a zone</p> 
         </div>

          <!-- react-text: 9995 -->

        <div data-reactid="10041">
         <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="10042"><em data-reactid="10043">Optional</em>
          <!-- react-text: 10044 --> parameters
          <!-- /react-text --></h4>
         <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="10045">
          <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="10046">
           <thead data-reactid="10047">
            <tr data-reactid="10048">
             <td data-reactid="10049">
              <!-- react-text: 10050 -->Name 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="10051">/type</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="10052">
              <!-- react-text: 10053 -->Description 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="10054">/example</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="10055">Constraints</td>
            </tr>
           </thead>
           <tbody data-reactid="10056">
            <tr data-reactid="10057">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="10058"><strong data-reactid="10059">bundle_method</strong><br data-reactid="10060"><small data-reactid="10061"><em data-reactid="10062"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="10063">
              <div data-reactid="10064">
               <p>A ubiquitous bundle is a bundle that has a higher probability of being verified everywhere, even by clients using outdated or unusual trust stores. An optimal bundle is a bundle with the shortest chain and newest intermediates. A forced method attempt to use the certificate/chain as defined by the input</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="10065">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="10066"><code data-reactid="10067">"ubiquitous"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="10068">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="10069">
               <li data-reactid="10070">default value: ubiquitous</li>
               <li data-reactid="10071">
                <!-- react-text: 10072 -->valid values: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 10073 -->ubiquitous, optimal, force
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>
        </div>

          </ul></h3>
         <div data-reactid="10109">
          <p>List, search, sort, and filter all of your custom SSL certificates. The priority fields deteremines the order in which the certificate will be used in a request. Higher numbers will be tried first.</p>

    "id": "7e7b8deba8538af625850b7b2530034c",
    "hosts": [
      "example.com"
    ],
    "issuer": "GlobalSign",
    "signature": "SHA256WithRSA",
    "status": "active",
    "bundle_method": "ubiquitous",
    "zone_id": "023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353",
    "uploaded_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00Z",
    "modified_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00Z",
    "expires_on": "2016-01-01T05:20:00Z",
    "priority": 1
  }
}</pre>
        </div>
       </section>
       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="10288">
        <a class="anchor2" id="custom-ssl-for-a-zone-update-ssl-configuration" data-reactid="10289">custom-ssl-for-a-zone-update-ssl-configuration</a>
        <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="10290">
         <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="10291"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="10292">PATCH</span>
          <!-- react-text: 10293 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 10294 -->Update SSL configuration
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 10295 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 10296 -->

           <!-- react-text: 10298 -->permission needed: 
           <!-- /react-text -->
           <!-- react-text: 10299 -->#ssl:edit

          <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="10300">
           <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="10301"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10302">free</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="10303"></div></li>
           <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="10304"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10305">pro</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="10306"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="10307"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10308">business</h6>

          </ul></h3>
         <div data-reactid="10313">
          <p>Upload a new private key and/or PEM/CRT for the SSL certificate</p> 
         </div>

            <tr data-reactid="10362">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="10363"><strong data-reactid="10364">bundle_method</strong><br data-reactid="10365"><small data-reactid="10366"><em data-reactid="10367"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="10368">
              <div data-reactid="10369">
               <p>A ubiquitous bundle is a bundle that has a higher probability of being verified everywhere, even by clients using outdated or unusual trust stores. An optimal bundle is a bundle with the shortest chain and newest intermediates. A forced method attempt to use the certificate/chain as defined by the input</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="10370">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="10371"><code data-reactid="10372">"ubiquitous"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="10373">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="10374">
               <li data-reactid="10375">default value: ubiquitous</li>
               <li data-reactid="10376">
                <!-- react-text: 10377 -->valid values: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 10378 -->ubiquitous, optimal, force
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>

       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="10389">
        <a class="anchor2" id="custom-ssl-for-a-zone-re-prioritize-ssl-certificates" data-reactid="10390">custom-ssl-for-a-zone-re-prioritize-ssl-certificates</a>
        <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="10391">
         <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="10392"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="10393">PUT</span>
          <!-- react-text: 10394 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 10395 -->Re-prioritize SSL certificates
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 10396 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 10397 --> 
          <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="10398">
           <!-- react-text: 10399 -->permission needed: 
           <!-- /react-text -->
           <!-- react-text: 10400 -->#ssl:edit
           <!-- /react-text --></small>
          <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="10401">
           <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="10402"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10403">free</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="10404"></div></li>
           <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="10405"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10406">pro</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="10407"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="10408"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10409">business</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="10410"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="10411"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10412">enterprise</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="10413"></div></li>
          </ul></h3>
         <div data-reactid="10414">
          <p>If a zone has multiple SSL certificates, you can set the order in which they should be used during a request. Higher priority numbers will be tried first.</p> 
         </div>
         <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="10415">
          <!-- react-text: 10416 -->PUT
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 10417 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 10418 -->zones/:zone_identifier/custom_certificates/prioritize
          <!-- /react-text --></pre>
        </div>
        <div data-reactid="10419">
         <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="10420"><em data-reactid="10421">Required</em>
          <!-- react-text: 10422 --> parameters
          <!-- /react-text --></h4>
         <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="10423">

               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="10445"><code data-reactid="10446">[ { "id": "5a7805061c76ada191ed06f989cc3dac", "priority": 2 }, { "id": "9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac", "priority": 1 } ]</code></small>

         <pre data-reactid="10453">curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/custom_certificates/prioritize" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="2e5b5d4b5c6e4b564f435e424b004d4143">[email&nbsp;protected]</a>" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"certificates":[{"id":"5a7805061c76ada191ed06f989cc3dac","priority":2},{"id":"9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac","priority":1}]}'</pre>

       <header data-reactid="10499">
        <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="custom-hostname-for-a-zone" data-reactid="10500"></div>
        <h2 data-reactid="10501">Custom Hostname for a Zone</h2>
        <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="10502">Manage hostnames for your zone that are routed via CNAME.</h4>
       </header>
       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="10503">
        <a class="anchor" id="custom-hostname-for-a-zone-properties" data-reactid="10504">custom-hostname-for-a-zone</a>
        <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="10505">
         <h4 data-reactid="10506">
          <!-- react-text: 10507 -->Object definition
          <!-- /react-text --></h4>
         <p data-reactid="10508">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
         <p data-reactid="10509"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="10510"><span class="verb" data-reactid="10511">Show</span>
           <!-- react-text: 10512 --> 
           <!-- /react-text -->
           <!-- react-text: 10513 -->definition
           <!-- /react-text --></a></p>
        </header>
       </section>
       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="10514">
        <a class="anchor2" id="custom-hostname-for-a-zone-create-custom-hostname" data-reactid="10515">custom-hostname-for-a-zone-create-custom-hostname</a>
        <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="10516">
         <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="10517"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="10518">POST</span>
          <!-- react-text: 10519 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 10520 -->Create custom hostname
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 10521 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 10522 --> 
          <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="10523">
           <!-- react-text: 10524 -->permission needed: 
           <!-- /react-text -->
           <!-- react-text: 10525 -->#ssl:edit
           <!-- /react-text --></small>
          <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="10526">
           <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="10527"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10528">free</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="10529"></div></li>
           <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="10530"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10531">pro</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="10532"></div></li>
           <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="10533"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10534">business</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="10535"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="10536"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10537">enterprise</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="10538"></div></li>
          </ul></h3>
         <div data-reactid="10539">
          <p>Add a new custom hostname and request that an SSL certificate be issued for it. One of three validation methodshttp, cname, emailshould be used, with 'http' recommended if the CNAME is already in place (or will be soon). Specifying 'email' will send an email to the WHOIS contacts on file for the base domain plus hostmaster, postmaster, webmaster, admin, administrator. Specifying 'cname' will return a CNAME that needs to be placed. If http is used and the domain is not already pointing to the Managed CNAME host, the PATCH method must be used once it is (to complete validation).</p> 
         </div>
         <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="10540">
          <!-- react-text: 10541 -->POST
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 10542 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 10543 -->zones/:zone_identifier/custom_hostnames
          <!-- /react-text --></pre>
        </div>
        <div data-reactid="10544">
         <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="10545"><em data-reactid="10546">Required</em>
          <!-- react-text: 10547 --> parameters
          <!-- /react-text --></h4>
         <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="10548">
          <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="10549">
           <thead data-reactid="10550">
            <tr data-reactid="10551">
             <td data-reactid="10552">
              <!-- react-text: 10553 -->Name 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="10554">/type</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="10555">
              <!-- react-text: 10556 -->Description 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="10557">/example</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="10558">Constraints</td>
            </tr>
           </thead>
           <tbody data-reactid="10559">
            <tr data-reactid="10560">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="10561"><strong data-reactid="10562">hostname</strong><br data-reactid="10563"><small data-reactid="10564"><em data-reactid="10565">
                <!-- react-text: 10566 -->string
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="10567">
              <div data-reactid="10568">
               <p>The custom hostname that will point to your hostname via CNAME.</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="10569">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="10570"><code data-reactid="10571">"app.example.com"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="10572">
