               <li data-reactid="10574">
                <!-- react-text: 10575 -->max length: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 10576 -->255
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
               <li data-reactid="10577">read only</li>
              </ul></td>

            <tr data-reactid="10578">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="10579"><strong data-reactid="10580">ssl</strong><br data-reactid="10581"><small data-reactid="10582"><em data-reactid="10583">
                <!-- react-text: 10584 -->object
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="10585">
              <div data-reactid="10586">
               <p>SSL properties used when creating the custom hostname</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="10587">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="10588"><code data-reactid="10589">{ "method": "http", "type": "dv" }</code></small>
               <span data-reactid="10590"><br data-reactid="10591">
                <!-- react-text: 10592 -->One of the following:
                <!-- /react-text --></span>
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="10593">
               <h6 data-reactid="10594"></h6>
               <div data-reactid="10595">

               </div>

         </div>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="10601">
         <!-- react-text: 10602 -->cURL 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="10603">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="10604">
         <pre data-reactid="10605">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/custom_hostnames" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="b9cccadccbf9dcc1d8d4c9d5dc97dad6d4">[email&nbsp;protected]</a>" \

            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="10736">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="10737"><strong data-reactid="10738">order</strong><br data-reactid="10739"><small data-reactid="10740"><em data-reactid="10741"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="10742">
              <div data-reactid="10743">
               <p>Field to order hostnames by</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="10744">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="10745"><code data-reactid="10746">"ssl"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="10747">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="10748">
               <li data-reactid="10749">default value: ssl</li>
               <li data-reactid="10750">
                <!-- react-text: 10751 -->valid values: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 10752 -->ssl, ssl_status
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="10753">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="10754"><strong data-reactid="10755">direction</strong><br data-reactid="10756"><small data-reactid="10757"><em data-reactid="10758"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="10759">
              <div data-reactid="10760">
               <p>Direction to order hostnames</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="10761">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="10762"><code data-reactid="10763">"desc"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="10764">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="10765">
               <li data-reactid="10766">
                <!-- react-text: 10767 -->valid values: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 10768 -->asc, desc
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="10769">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="10770"><strong data-reactid="10771">ssl</strong><br data-reactid="10772"><small data-reactid="10773"><em data-reactid="10774"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="10775">
              <div data-reactid="10776">
               <p>Whether to filter hostnames based on if they have SSL enabled</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="10777">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="10778"><code data-reactid="10779">"0"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="10780">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="10781">
               <li data-reactid="10782">default value: 0</li>
               <li data-reactid="10783">
                <!-- react-text: 10784 -->valid values: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 10785 -->0, 1
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>
        </div>

       <header data-reactid="10954">
        <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="keyless-ssl-for-a-zone" data-reactid="10955"></div>
        <h2 data-reactid="10956">Keyless SSL for a Zone</h2>
        <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="10957">A Keyless certificate is an SSL certificate where the SSL private key is not stored on Cloudflare</h4>
       </header>
       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="10958">
        <a class="anchor" id="keyless-ssl-for-a-zone-properties" data-reactid="10959">keyless-ssl-for-a-zone</a>

           <!-- /react-text --></a></p>
        </header>
       </section>

        <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="10971">

         <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="10999"><em data-reactid="11000">Required</em>

         <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="11002">

            <tr data-reactid="11014">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11015"><strong data-reactid="11016">host</strong><br data-reactid="11017"><small data-reactid="11018"><em data-reactid="11019">
                <!-- react-text: 11020 -->string
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11021">
              <div data-reactid="11022">
               <p>The keyless SSL name</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11023">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11024"><code data-reactid="11025">"example.com"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11026">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11027">
               <li data-reactid="11028">
                <!-- react-text: 11029 -->max length: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 11030 -->253
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
               <li data-reactid="11031">
                <!-- react-text: 11032 -->pattern: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 11033 -->hostname_or_ip
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="11034">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11035"><strong data-reactid="11036">port</strong><br data-reactid="11037"><small data-reactid="11038"><em data-reactid="11039">
                <!-- react-text: 11040 -->number
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11041">
              <div data-reactid="11042">
               <p>The keyless SSL port used to commmunicate between Cloudflare and the client's Keyless SSL server</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11043">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11044"><code data-reactid="11045">24008</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11046">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11047">
               <li data-reactid="11048">default value: 24008</li>
               <li data-reactid="11049">
                <!-- react-text: 11050 -->max length: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 11051 -->65535
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="11052">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11053"><strong data-reactid="11054">certificate</strong><br data-reactid="11055"><small data-reactid="11056"><em data-reactid="11057">
                <!-- react-text: 11058 -->string
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11059">
              <div data-reactid="11060">
               <p>The zone's SSL certificate or SSL certificate and intermediate(s)</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11061">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11062"><code data-reactid="11063">"-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE----- MIIDtTCCAp2gAwIBAgIJAM15n7fdxhRtMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBBQUAMEUxCzAJBgNV BAYTAlVTMRMwEQYDVQQIEwpTb21lLVN0YXRlMSEwHwYDVQQKExhJbnRlcm5ldCBX aWRnaXRzIFB0eSBMdGQwHhcNMTQwMzExMTkyMTU5WhcNMTQwNDEwMTkyMTU5WjBF MQswCQYDVQQGEwJVUzETMBEGA1UECBMKU29tZS1TdGF0ZTEhMB8GA1UEChMYSW50 ZXJuZXQgV2lkZ2l0cyBQdHkgTHRkMIIBIjANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQEFAAOCAQ8AMIIB CgKCAQEAvq3sKsHpeduJHimOK+fvQdKsI8z8A05MZyyLp2/R/GE8FjNv+hkVY1WQ LIyTNNQH7CJecE1nbTfo8Y56S7x/rhxC6/DJ8MIulapFPnorq46KU6yRxiM0MQ3N nTJHlHA2ozZta6YBBfVfhHWl1F0IfNbXCLKvGwWWMbCx43OfW6KTkbRnE6gFWKuO fSO5h2u5TaWVuSIzBvYs7Vza6m+gtYAvKAJV2nSZ+eSEFPDo29corOy8+huEOUL8 5FAw4BFPsr1TlrlGPFitduQUHGrSL7skk1ESGza0to3bOtrodKei2s9bk5MXm7lZ qI+WZJX4Zu9+mzZhc9pCVi8r/qlXuQIDAQABo4GnMIGkMB0GA1UdDgQWBBRvavf+ sWM4IwKiH9X9w1vl6nUVRDB1BgNVHSMEbjBsgBRvavf+sWM4IwKiH9X9w1vl6nUV RKFJpEcwRTELMAkGA1UEBhMCVVMxEzARBgNVBAgTClNvbWUtU3RhdGUxITAfBgNV BAoTGEludGVybmV0IFdpZGdpdHMgUHR5IEx0ZIIJAM15n7fdxhRtMAwGA1UdEwQF MAMBAf8wDQYJKoZIhvcNAQEFBQADggEBABY2ZzBaW0dMsAAT7tPJzrVWVzQx6KU4 UEBLudIlWPlkAwTnINCWR/8eNjCCmGA4heUdHmazdpPa8RzwOmc0NT1NQqzSyktt vTqb4iHD7+8f9MqJ9/FssCfTtqr/Qst/hGH4Wmdf1EJ/6FqYAAb5iRlPgshFZxU8 uXtA8hWn6fK6eISD9HBdcAFToUvKNZ1BIDPvh9f95Ine8ar6yGd56TUNrHR8eHBs ESxz5ddVR/oWRysNJ+aGAyYqHS8S/ttmC7r4XCAHqXptkHPCGRqkAhsterYhd4I8 /cBzejUobNCjjHFbtkAL/SjxZOLW+pNkZwfeYdM8iPkD54Uua1v2tdw= -----END CERTIFICATE-----"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11064">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11065"></ul></td>

        <div data-reactid="11066">

           <thead data-reactid="11072">
            <tr data-reactid="11073">
             <td data-reactid="11074">

                <!-- react-text: 11088 -->string
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>

              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11091">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11092"><code data-reactid="11093">"example.com Keyless SSL"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11094">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11095">
               <li data-reactid="11096">
                <!-- react-text: 11097 -->max length: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 11098 -->180
                <!-- /react-text --></li>

              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="11100">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11101"><strong data-reactid="11102">bundle_method</strong><br data-reactid="11103"><small data-reactid="11104"><em data-reactid="11105"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11106">
              <div data-reactid="11107">
               <p>A ubiquitous bundle is a bundle that has a higher probability of being verified everywhere, even by clients using outdated or unusual trust stores. An optimal bundle is a bundle with the shortest chain and newest intermediates. A forced method attempt to use the certificate/chain as defined by the input</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11108">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11109"><code data-reactid="11110">"ubiquitous"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11111">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11112">
               <li data-reactid="11113">default value: ubiquitous</li>
               <li data-reactid="11114">
                <!-- react-text: 11115 -->valid values: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 11116 -->ubiquitous, optimal, force
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>
        </div>

       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="11207">
        <a class="anchor2" id="keyless-ssl-for-a-zone-update-keyless-configuration" data-reactid="11208">keyless-ssl-for-a-zone-update-keyless-configuration</a>
        <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="11209">
         <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="11210"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="11211">PATCH</span>
          <!-- react-text: 11212 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 11213 -->Update Keyless configuration
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 11214 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 11215 --> 
          <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="11216">
           <!-- react-text: 11217 -->permission needed: 
           <!-- /react-text -->
           <!-- react-text: 11218 -->#ssl:edit
           <!-- /react-text --></small>
          <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="11219">
           <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="11220"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11221">free</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="11222"></div></li>
           <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="11223"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11224">pro</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="11225"></div></li>
           <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="11226"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11227">business</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="11228"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11229"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11230">enterprise</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11231"></div></li>
          </ul></h3>
         <div data-reactid="11232">
          <p>This will update attributes of a Keyless SSL. Consists of one or more of the following: host,name,port,certificate,enabled</p> 
         </div>
         <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="11233">
          <!-- react-text: 11234 -->PATCH
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 11235 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 11236 -->zones/:zone_identifier/keyless_certificates/:identifier
          <!-- /react-text --></pre>
        </div>
        <div data-reactid="11237">
         <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="11238"><em data-reactid="11239">Optional</em>
          <!-- react-text: 11240 --> parameters
          <!-- /react-text --></h4>
         <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="11241">
          <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="11242">
           <thead data-reactid="11243">
            <tr data-reactid="11244">
             <td data-reactid="11245">
              <!-- react-text: 11246 -->Name 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="11247">/type</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="11248">
              <!-- react-text: 11249 -->Description 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="11250">/example</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="11251">Constraints</td>
            </tr>
           </thead>
           <tbody data-reactid="11252">
            <tr data-reactid="11253">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11254"><strong data-reactid="11255">host</strong><br data-reactid="11256"><small data-reactid="11257"><em data-reactid="11258">
                <!-- react-text: 11259 -->string
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11260">
              <div data-reactid="11261">
               <p>The keyless SSL name</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11262">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11263"><code data-reactid="11264">"example.com"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11265">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11266">
               <li data-reactid="11267">
                <!-- react-text: 11268 -->max length: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 11269 -->253
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
               <li data-reactid="11270">
                <!-- react-text: 11271 -->pattern: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 11272 -->hostname_or_ip
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="11273">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11274"><strong data-reactid="11275">name</strong><br data-reactid="11276"><small data-reactid="11277"><em data-reactid="11278">
                <!-- react-text: 11279 -->string
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11280">
              <div data-reactid="11281">
               <p>The keyless SSL name</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11282">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11283"><code data-reactid="11284">"example.com Keyless SSL"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11285">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11286">
               <li data-reactid="11287">
                <!-- react-text: 11288 -->max length: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 11289 -->180
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
               <li data-reactid="11290">read only</li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="11291">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11292"><strong data-reactid="11293">port</strong><br data-reactid="11294"><small data-reactid="11295"><em data-reactid="11296">
                <!-- react-text: 11297 -->number
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11298">
              <div data-reactid="11299">
               <p>The keyless SSL port used to commmunicate between Cloudflare and the client's Keyless SSL server</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11300">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11301"><code data-reactid="11302">24008</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11303">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11304">
               <li data-reactid="11305">default value: 24008</li>
               <li data-reactid="11306">
                <!-- react-text: 11307 -->max length: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 11308 -->65535
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="11309">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11310"><strong data-reactid="11311">enabled</strong><br data-reactid="11312"><small data-reactid="11313"><em data-reactid="11314">
                <!-- react-text: 11315 -->boolean
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11316">
              <div data-reactid="11317">
               <p>Whether or not the Keyless SSL is on or off</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11318">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11319"><code data-reactid="11320">false</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11321">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11322">
               <li data-reactid="11323">valid values: (true,false)</li>
               <li data-reactid="11324">read only</li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="11325">
         <!-- react-text: 11326 -->cURL 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="11327">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="11328">
         <pre data-reactid="11329">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/keyless_certificates/4d2844d2ce78891c34d0b6c0535a291e" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="4f3a3c2a3d0f2a372e223f232a612c2022">[email&nbsp;protected]</a>" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"host":"example.com","name":"example.com Keyless SSL","port":24008,"enabled":false}'</pre>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="11330">
         <!-- react-text: 11331 -->Response 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="11332">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="11333">
         <pre data-reactid="11334">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [
    {}
  ],
  "messages": [
    {}
  ],
  "result": {
    "id": "4d2844d2ce78891c34d0b6c0535a291e",
    "name": "example.com Keyless SSL",
    "host": "example.com",
    "port": 24008,
    "status": "active",
    "enabled": false,
    "permissions": [
      "#ssl:read",
      "#ssl:edit"
    ],
    "created_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00Z",
    "modified_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00Z"
  }
}</pre>
        </div>
       </section>

       <header data-reactid="11375">
        <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="page-rules-for-a-zone" data-reactid="11376"></div>
        <h2 data-reactid="11377">Page rules for a Zone</h2>
        <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="11378">A rule describing target patterns for requests and actions to perform on matching requests</h4>
       </header>
       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="11379">
        <a class="anchor" id="page-rules-for-a-zone-properties" data-reactid="11380">page-rules-for-a-zone</a>
        <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="11381">
         <h4 data-reactid="11382">
          <!-- react-text: 11383 -->Object definition
          <!-- /react-text --></h4>
         <p data-reactid="11384">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
         <p data-reactid="11385"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="11386"><span class="verb" data-reactid="11387">Show</span>
           <!-- react-text: 11388 --> 
           <!-- /react-text -->
           <!-- react-text: 11389 -->definition
           <!-- /react-text --></a></p>
        </header>
       </section>
       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="11390">
        <a class="anchor2" id="page-rules-for-a-zone-create-a-page-rule" data-reactid="11391">page-rules-for-a-zone-create-a-page-rule</a>
        <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="11392">
         <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="11393"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="11394">POST</span>
          <!-- react-text: 11395 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 11396 -->Create a page rule
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 11397 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 11398 --> 
          <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="11399">
           <!-- react-text: 11400 -->permission needed: 
           <!-- /react-text -->
           <!-- react-text: 11401 -->#zone:edit
           <!-- /react-text --></small>
          <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="11402">
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11403"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11404">free</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11405"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11406"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11407">pro</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11408"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11409"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11410">business</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11411"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11412"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11413">enterprise</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11414"></div></li>
          </ul></h3>
         <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="11415">
          <!-- react-text: 11416 -->POST
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 11417 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 11418 -->zones/:zone_identifier/pagerules
          <!-- /react-text --></pre>
        </div>
        <div data-reactid="11419">
         <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="11420"><em data-reactid="11421">Required</em>
          <!-- react-text: 11422 --> parameters
          <!-- /react-text --></h4>
         <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="11423">
          <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="11424">
           <thead data-reactid="11425">
            <tr data-reactid="11426">
             <td data-reactid="11427">
              <!-- react-text: 11428 -->Name 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="11429">/type</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="11430">
              <!-- react-text: 11431 -->Description 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="11432">/example</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="11433">Constraints</td>
            </tr>
           </thead>
           <tbody data-reactid="11434">
            <tr data-reactid="11435">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11436"><strong data-reactid="11437">targets</strong><br data-reactid="11438"><small data-reactid="11439"><em data-reactid="11440">
                <!-- react-text: 11441 -->array
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11442">
              <div data-reactid="11443">
               <p>Targets to evaluate on a request</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11444">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11445"><code data-reactid="11446">[ { "target": "url", "constraint": { "operator": "matches", "value": "*example.com/images/*" } } ]</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11447">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11448"></ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="11449">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11450"><strong data-reactid="11451">actions</strong><br data-reactid="11452"><small data-reactid="11453"><em data-reactid="11454">
                <!-- react-text: 11455 -->array
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11456">
              <div data-reactid="11457">
               <p>The set of actions to perform if the targets of this rule match the request. Actions can redirect the url to another url or override settings (but not both)</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11458">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11459"><code data-reactid="11460">[ { "id": "always_online", "value": "on" } ]</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11461">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11462"></ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div data-reactid="11463">
         <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="11464"><em data-reactid="11465">Optional</em>
          <!-- react-text: 11466 --> parameters
          <!-- /react-text --></h4>
         <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="11467">
          <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="11468">
           <thead data-reactid="11469">
            <tr data-reactid="11470">
             <td data-reactid="11471">
              <!-- react-text: 11472 -->Name 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="11473">/type</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="11474">
              <!-- react-text: 11475 -->Description 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="11476">/example</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="11477">Constraints</td>
            </tr>
           </thead>
           <tbody data-reactid="11478">
            <tr data-reactid="11479">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11480"><strong data-reactid="11481">priority</strong><br data-reactid="11482"><small data-reactid="11483"><em data-reactid="11484">
                <!-- react-text: 11485 -->integer
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11486">
              <div data-reactid="11487">
               <p>A number that indicates the preference for a page rule over another. In the case where you may have a catch-all page rule (e.g., #1: '/images/<em>') but want a rule that is more specific to take precedence (e.g., #2: '/images/special/</em>'), you'll want to specify a higher priority on the latter (#2) so it will override the first.</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11488">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11489"><code data-reactid="11490">1</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11491">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11492">
               <li data-reactid="11493">default value: 1</li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="11494">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11495"><strong data-reactid="11496">status</strong><br data-reactid="11497"><small data-reactid="11498"><em data-reactid="11499"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11500">
              <div data-reactid="11501">
               <p>Status of the page rule</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11502">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11503"><code data-reactid="11504">"active"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11505">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11506">
               <li data-reactid="11507">default value: disabled</li>
               <li data-reactid="11508">
                <!-- react-text: 11509 -->valid values: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 11510 -->active, disabled
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="11511">
         <!-- react-text: 11512 -->cURL 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="11513">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="11514">
         <pre data-reactid="11515">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/pagerules" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="156066706755706d74786579703b767a78">[email&nbsp;protected]</a>" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"targets":[{"target":"url","constraint":{"operator":"matches","value":"*example.com/images/*"}}],"actions":[{"id":"always_online","value":"on"}],"priority":1,"status":"active"}'</pre>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="11516">
         <!-- react-text: 11517 -->Response 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="11518">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="11519">
         <pre data-reactid="11520">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [
    {}
  ],
  "messages": [
    {}
  ],
  "result": {
    "id": "9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac",
    "targets": [
      {
        "target": "url",
        "constraint": {
          "operator": "matches",
          "value": "*example.com/images/*"
        }
      }
    ],
    "actions": [
      {
        "id": "always_online",
        "value": "on"
      }
    ],
    "priority": 1,
    "status": "active",
    "modified_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
    "created_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z"
  }
}</pre>
        </div>
       </section>

         <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="11554">

           <thead data-reactid="11556">
            <tr data-reactid="11557">
             <td data-reactid="11558">
              <!-- react-text: 11559 -->Name 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="11560">/type</small></td>

              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="11563">/example</small></td>

           <tbody data-reactid="11565">
            <tr data-reactid="11566">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11567"><strong data-reactid="11568">status</strong><br data-reactid="11569"><small data-reactid="11570"><em data-reactid="11571"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11572">

              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11574">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11575"><code data-reactid="11576">"active"</code></small>

             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11577">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11578">
               <li data-reactid="11579">default value: disabled</li>
               <li data-reactid="11580">
                <!-- react-text: 11581 -->valid values: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 11582 -->active, disabled
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="11583">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11584"><strong data-reactid="11585">order</strong><br data-reactid="11586"><small data-reactid="11587"><em data-reactid="11588"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11589">
              <div data-reactid="11590">
               <p>Field to order page rules by</p> 
              </div>

               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11592"><code data-reactid="11593">"status"</code></small>
              </div></td>

                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>

             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11601"><strong data-reactid="11602">direction</strong><br data-reactid="11603"><small data-reactid="11604"><em data-reactid="11605"></em></small></td>

              </div></td>

                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 11616 -->asc, desc
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="11617">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11618"><strong data-reactid="11619">match</strong><br data-reactid="11620"><small data-reactid="11621"><em data-reactid="11622"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11623">

               <p>Whether to match all search requirements or at least one (any)</p> 
              </div>

              </div></td>

                <!-- /react-text --></li>

          <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="11717">
           <thead data-reactid="11718">
            <tr data-reactid="11719">
             <td data-reactid="11720">
              <!-- react-text: 11721 -->Name 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="11722">/type</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="11723">

             <td data-reactid="11726">Constraints</td>

            <tr data-reactid="11728">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11729"><strong data-reactid="11730">targets</strong><br data-reactid="11731"><small data-reactid="11732"><em data-reactid="11733">
                <!-- react-text: 11734 -->array
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11735">
              <div data-reactid="11736">
               <p>Targets to evaluate on a request</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11737">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11738"><code data-reactid="11739">[ { "target": "url", "constraint": { "operator": "matches", "value": "*example.com/images/*" } } ]</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11740">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11741"></ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="11742">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11743"><strong data-reactid="11744">actions</strong><br data-reactid="11745"><small data-reactid="11746"><em data-reactid="11747">
                <!-- react-text: 11748 -->array
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11749">
              <div data-reactid="11750">
               <p>The set of actions to perform if the targets of this rule match the request. Actions can redirect the url to another url or override settings (but not both)</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11751">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11752"><code data-reactid="11753">[ { "id": "always_online", "value": "on" } ]</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11754">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11755"></ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="11756">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11757"><strong data-reactid="11758">priority</strong><br data-reactid="11759"><small data-reactid="11760"><em data-reactid="11761">
                <!-- react-text: 11762 -->integer
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11763">
              <div data-reactid="11764">
               <p>A number that indicates the preference for a page rule over another. In the case where you may have a catch-all page rule (e.g., #1: '/images/<em>') but want a rule that is more specific to take precedence (e.g., #2: '/images/special/</em>'), you'll want to specify a higher priority on the latter (#2) so it will override the first.</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11765">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11766"><code data-reactid="11767">1</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11768">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11769">
               <li data-reactid="11770">default value: 1</li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="11771">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11772"><strong data-reactid="11773">status</strong><br data-reactid="11774"><small data-reactid="11775"><em data-reactid="11776"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11777">
              <div data-reactid="11778">
               <p>Status of the page rule</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11779">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11780"><code data-reactid="11781">"active"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11782">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11783">
               <li data-reactid="11784">default value: disabled</li>
               <li data-reactid="11785">
                <!-- react-text: 11786 -->valid values: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 11787 -->active, disabled
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>

     -H "X-Auth-Email: <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="aedbddcbdceecbd6cfc3">[email&nbsp;protected]</a>ple.com" \

           <tbody data-reactid="11887">
            <tr data-reactid="11888">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11889"><strong data-reactid="11890">priority</strong><br data-reactid="11891"><small data-reactid="11892"><em data-reactid="11893">
                <!-- react-text: 11894 -->integer
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11895">
              <div data-reactid="11896">
               <p>A number that indicates the preference for a page rule over another. In the case where you may have a catch-all page rule (e.g., #1: '/images/<em>') but want a rule that is more specific to take precedence (e.g., #2: '/images/special/</em>'), you'll want to specify a higher priority on the latter (#2) so it will override the first.</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11897">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11898"><code data-reactid="11899">1</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11900">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11901">
               <li data-reactid="11902">default value: 1</li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="11903">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11904"><strong data-reactid="11905">status</strong><br data-reactid="11906"><small data-reactid="11907"><em data-reactid="11908"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11909">
              <div data-reactid="11910">
               <p>Status of the page rule</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="11911">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11912"><code data-reactid="11913">"active"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11914">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11915">
               <li data-reactid="11916">default value: disabled</li>
               <li data-reactid="11917">
                <!-- react-text: 11918 -->valid values: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 11919 -->active, disabled
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="11920">
         <!-- react-text: 11921 -->cURL 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="11922">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="11923">
         <pre data-reactid="11924">curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/pagerules/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="e297918790a2879a838f928e87cc818d8f">[email&nbsp;protected]</a>" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"targets":[{"target":"url","constraint":{"operator":"matches","value":"*example.com/images/*"}}],"actions":[{"id":"always_online","value":"on"}],"priority":1,"status":"active"}'</pre>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="11925">
         <!-- react-text: 11926 -->Response 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="11927">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="11928">
         <pre data-reactid="11929">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [
    {}
  ],
  "messages": [
    {}
  ],
  "result": {
    "id": "9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac",
    "targets": [
      {
        "target": "url",
        "constraint": {
          "operator": "matches",
          "value": "*example.com/images/*"
        }
      }
    ],
    "actions": [
      {
        "id": "always_online",
        "value": "on"
      }
    ],
    "priority": 1,
    "status": "active",
    "modified_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
    "created_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z"
  }
}</pre>
        </div>
       </section>

         <!-- react-text: 12076 -->Response

         <pre data-reactid="12079">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [
    {}
  ],
  "messages": [
    {}
  ],
  "result": [
    {
      "id": "372e67954025e0ba6aaa6d586b9e0b59",
      "disabled": false,
      "description": "Prevent multiple login failures to mitigate brute force attacks",
      "match": {
        "request": {
          "methods": [
            "GET",
            "POST"
          ],
          "schemes": [
            "HTTP",
            "HTTPS"
          ],
          "url": "*.example.org/path*"
        },
        "response": {
          "status": [
            401,
            403
          ],
          "origin_traffic": true
        }
      },
      "bypass": [
        {
          "name": "url",
          "value": "api.example.com/*"
        }
      ],
      "threshold": 60,
      "period": 900,
      "action": {
        "mode": "simulate",
        "timeout": 86400,
        "response": {
          "content_type": "text/xml",
          "body": "&lt;error&gt;This request has been rate-limited.&lt;/error&gt;"
        }
      }
    }
  ],
  "result_info": {
    "page": 1,
    "per_page": 20,
    "count": 1,
    "total_count": 2000
  }
}</pre>
        </div>

       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="12080">
        <a class="anchor2" id="rate-limits-for-a-zone-create-a-ratelimit" data-reactid="12081">rate-limits-for-a-zone-create-a-ratelimit</a>
        <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="12082">
         <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="12083"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="12084">POST</span>
          <!-- react-text: 12085 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 12086 -->Create a ratelimit
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 12087 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 12088 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="12089">
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12090"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12091">free</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12092"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12093"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12094">pro</h6>

           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12096"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12097">business</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12098"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12099"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12100">enterprise</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12101"></div></li>
          </ul></h3>
         <div data-reactid="12102">
          <p>Create a new rate limit for a zone. See the record object definitions for required attributes for each record type</p> 
         </div>
         <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="12103">
          <!-- react-text: 12104 -->POST
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 12105 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 12106 -->zones/:zone_identifier/rate_limits
          <!-- /react-text --></pre>
        </div>
        <div data-reactid="12107">
         <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="12108"><em data-reactid="12109">Required</em>
          <!-- react-text: 12110 --> parameters
          <!-- /react-text --></h4>
         <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="12111">
          <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="12112">
           <thead data-reactid="12113">
            <tr data-reactid="12114">
             <td data-reactid="12115">
              <!-- react-text: 12116 -->Name 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="12117">/type</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="12118">
              <!-- react-text: 12119 -->Description 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="12120">/example</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="12121">Constraints</td>
            </tr>
           </thead>
           <tbody data-reactid="12122">
            <tr data-reactid="12123">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12124"><strong data-reactid="12125">match</strong><br data-reactid="12126"><small data-reactid="12127"><em data-reactid="12128">
                <!-- react-text: 12129 -->object
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="12130">
              <div data-reactid="12131">
               <p>Determines which traffic the rate limit counts towards the threshold</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="12132">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="12133"><code data-reactid="12134">{ "request": { "methods": [ "GET", "POST" ], "schemes": [ "HTTP", "HTTPS" ], "url": "*.example.org/path*" }, "response": { "status": [ 401, 403 ], "origin_traffic": true } }</code></small>
               <span data-reactid="12135"><br data-reactid="12136">
                <!-- react-text: 12137 -->One of the following:
                <!-- /react-text --></span>
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="12138">
               <h6 data-reactid="12139"></h6>
               <div data-reactid="12140">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="12141"><span class="verb" data-reactid="12142">Show</span>
                 <!-- react-text: 12143 --> definition 
                 <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="12144">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12145"></ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="12146">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12147"><strong data-reactid="12148">threshold</strong><br data-reactid="12149"><small data-reactid="12150"><em data-reactid="12151">
                <!-- react-text: 12152 -->number
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="12153">
              <div data-reactid="12154">
               <p>The threshold that triggers the rate limit mitigations, combine with period. i.e. threshold per period</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="12155">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="12156"><code data-reactid="12157">60</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="12158">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12159">
               <li data-reactid="12160">
                <!-- react-text: 12161 -->min value
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12162 -->:
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12163 -->2
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
               <li data-reactid="12164">
                <!-- react-text: 12165 -->max value
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12166 -->:
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12167 -->1000000
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="12168">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12169"><strong data-reactid="12170">period</strong><br data-reactid="12171"><small data-reactid="12172"><em data-reactid="12173">
                <!-- react-text: 12174 -->number
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="12175">
              <div data-reactid="12176">
               <p>The time in seconds to count matching traffic. If the count exceeds threshold within this period the action will be performed</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="12177">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="12178"><code data-reactid="12179">900</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="12180">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12181">
               <li data-reactid="12182">
                <!-- react-text: 12183 -->min value
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12184 -->:
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12185 -->1
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
               <li data-reactid="12186">
                <!-- react-text: 12187 -->max value
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12188 -->:
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12189 -->86400
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="12190">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12191"><strong data-reactid="12192">action</strong><br data-reactid="12193"><small data-reactid="12194"><em data-reactid="12195">
                <!-- react-text: 12196 -->object
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="12197">
              <div data-reactid="12198">
               <p>The action to be performed when the threshold of matched traffic within the period defined is exceeded</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="12199">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="12200"><code data-reactid="12201">{ "mode": "simulate", "timeout": 86400, "response": { "content_type": "text/xml", "body": "&lt;error&gt;This request has been rate-limited.&lt;/error&gt;" } }</code></small>
               <span data-reactid="12202"><br data-reactid="12203">
                <!-- react-text: 12204 -->Any of the following:
                <!-- /react-text --></span>
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="12205">
               <h6 data-reactid="12206"></h6>
               <div data-reactid="12207">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="12208"><span class="verb" data-reactid="12209">Show</span>
                 <!-- react-text: 12210 --> definition 
                 <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="12211">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12212"></ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>

             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="12286">

        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="12293">
         <!-- react-text: 12294 -->cURL 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="12295">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="12296">
         <pre data-reactid="12297">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/rate_limits" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="394c4a5c4b795c41585449555c175a5654">[email&nbsp;protected]</a>" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"id":"372e67954025e0ba6aaa6d586b9e0b59","disabled":false,"description":"Prevent multiple login failures to mitigate brute force attacks","match":{"request":{"methods":["GET","POST"],"schemes":["HTTP","HTTPS"],"url":"*.example.org/path*"},"response":{"status":[401,403],"origin_traffic":true}},"bypass":[{"name":"url","value":"api.example.com/*"}],"threshold":60,"period":900,"action":{"mode":"simulate","timeout":86400,"response":{"content_type":"text/xml","body":"&lt;error&gt;This request has been rate-limited.&lt;/error&gt;"}}}'</pre>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="12298">
         <!-- react-text: 12299 -->Response 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="12300">(example)</small></h5>

  "success": true,
  "errors": [
    {}
  ],

    "disabled": false,
    "description": "Prevent multiple login failures to mitigate brute force attacks",
    "match": {
      "request": {
        "methods": [
          "GET",
          "POST"
        ],
        "schemes": [
          "HTTP",
          "HTTPS"
        ],
        "url": "*.example.org/path*"
      },
      "response": {
        "status": [
          401,
          403
        ],
        "origin_traffic": true
      }
    },

      {

             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="12517">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12518">
               <li data-reactid="12519">valid values: (true,false)</li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="12520">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12521"><strong data-reactid="12522">description</strong><br data-reactid="12523"><small data-reactid="12524"><em data-reactid="12525">
                <!-- react-text: 12526 -->string
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="12527">
              <div data-reactid="12528">
               <p>A note that you can use to describe the reason for a rate limit. This value is sanitized and all tags are removed</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="12529">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="12530"><code data-reactid="12531">"Prevent multiple login failures to mitigate brute force attacks"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="12532">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12533">
               <li data-reactid="12534">
                <!-- react-text: 12535 -->max length: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12536 -->1024
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="12537">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12538"><strong data-reactid="12539">bypass</strong><br data-reactid="12540"><small data-reactid="12541"><em data-reactid="12542">
                <!-- react-text: 12543 -->array
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="12544">
              <div data-reactid="12545">
               <p>Criteria that would allow the rate limit to be bypassed, for example to express that you shouldn't apply a rate limit to a given set of URLs</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="12546">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="12547"><code data-reactid="12548">[ { "name": "url", "value": "api.example.com/*" } ]</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="12549">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12550"></ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="12551">
         <!-- react-text: 12552 -->cURL 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="12553">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="12554">
         <pre data-reactid="12555">curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/rate_limits/372e67954025e0ba6aaa6d586b9e0b59" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="5025233522103528313d203c357e333f3d">[email&nbsp;protected]</a>" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"id":"372e67954025e0ba6aaa6d586b9e0b59","disabled":false,"description":"Prevent multiple login failures to mitigate brute force attacks","match":{"request":{"methods":["GET","POST"],"schemes":["HTTP","HTTPS"],"url":"*.example.org/path*"},"response":{"status":[401,403],"origin_traffic":true}},"bypass":[{"name":"url","value":"api.example.com/*"}],"threshold":60,"period":900,"action":{"mode":"simulate","timeout":86400,"response":{"content_type":"text/xml","body":"&lt;error&gt;This request has been rate-limited.&lt;/error&gt;"}}}'</pre>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="12556">
         <!-- react-text: 12557 -->Response 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="12558">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="12559">
         <pre data-reactid="12560">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [
    {}
  ],
  "messages": [
    {}
  ],
  "result": {
    "id": "372e67954025e0ba6aaa6d586b9e0b59",
    "disabled": false,
    "description": "Prevent multiple login failures to mitigate brute force attacks",
    "match": {
      "request": {
        "methods": [
          "GET",
          "POST"
        ],
        "schemes": [
          "HTTP",
          "HTTPS"
        ],
        "url": "*.example.org/path*"
      },
      "response": {
        "status": [
          401,
          403
        ],
        "origin_traffic": true
      }
    },
    "bypass": [
      {
        "name": "url",
        "value": "api.example.com/*"
      }
    ],
    "threshold": 60,
    "period": 900,
    "action": {
      "mode": "simulate",
      "timeout": 86400,
      "response": {
        "content_type": "text/xml",
        "body": "&lt;error&gt;This request has been rate-limited.&lt;/error&gt;"
      }
    }
  }
}</pre>
        </div>
       </section>

      <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="12653">
       <header data-reactid="12654">
        <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="firewall-access-rule-for-a-zone" data-reactid="12655"></div>
        <h2 data-reactid="12656">Firewall access rule for a Zone</h2>
        <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="12657">An IP, IP range, or country specific firewall rule applied directly to a zone or inherited from user or organization-level rules.</h4>
        <div data-reactid="12658">
         <p>Access Rules are a way to allow, challenge, or block requests to your website based on the IP address, IP address range, or country of the browser making the request.</p> 
         <p>You can apply Access Rules to one zone only or all zones in your account. See the User-level or Organization-level access rules endpoints for creating rules that are applied across all zones owned by the user or organization.</p> 
        </div>
       </header>
       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="12659">
        <a class="anchor" id="firewall-access-rule-for-a-zone-properties" data-reactid="12660">firewall-access-rule-for-a-zone</a>
        <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="12661">
         <h4 data-reactid="12662">
          <!-- react-text: 12663 -->Object definition
          <!-- /react-text --></h4>
         <p data-reactid="12664">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
         <p data-reactid="12665"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="12666"><span class="verb" data-reactid="12667">Show</span>
           <!-- react-text: 12668 --> 
           <!-- /react-text -->
           <!-- react-text: 12669 -->definition
           <!-- /react-text --></a></p>
        </header>
       </section>
       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="12670">
        <a class="anchor2" id="firewall-access-rule-for-a-zone-list-access-rules" data-reactid="12671">firewall-access-rule-for-a-zone-list-access-rules</a>
        <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="12672">
         <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="12673"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="12674">GET</span>

          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 12676 -->List access rules

           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12683"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12684">pro</h6>

           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12686"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12687">business</h6>

          </ul></h3>
         <div data-reactid="12692">
          <p>Search, sort, and filter IP/country access rules</p> 
         </div>
         <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="12693">
          <!-- react-text: 12694 -->GET
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 12695 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 12696 -->zones/:zone_id/firewall/access_rules/rules
          <!-- /react-text --></pre>
        </div>
        <div data-reactid="12697">
         <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="12698"><em data-reactid="12699">Optional</em>
          <!-- react-text: 12700 --> parameters
          <!-- /react-text --></h4>
         <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="12701">
          <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="12702">
           <thead data-reactid="12703">
            <tr data-reactid="12704">
             <td data-reactid="12705">
              <!-- react-text: 12706 -->Name 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="12707">/type</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="12708">
              <!-- react-text: 12709 -->Description 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="12710">/example</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="12711">Constraints</td>
            </tr>
           </thead>
           <tbody data-reactid="12712">
            <tr data-reactid="12713">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12714"><strong data-reactid="12715">notes</strong><br data-reactid="12716"><small data-reactid="12717"><em data-reactid="12718">
                <!-- react-text: 12719 -->string
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="12720">
              <div data-reactid="12721">
               <p>Search in the access rules by notes.</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="12722">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="12723"><code data-reactid="12724">"mynote"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="12725">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12726">
               <li data-reactid="12727">
                <!-- react-text: 12728 -->notes: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12729 -->Matching any string within previously created access rules with the notes. For example, access rules with notes 'Attack 26/02' &amp; 'Attack 27/02' would both match string 'attack'. Search is not case sensitive.
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="12730">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12731"><strong data-reactid="12732">mode</strong><br data-reactid="12733"><small data-reactid="12734"><em data-reactid="12735"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="12736">
              <div data-reactid="12737">
               <p>The action to apply to a matched request</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="12738">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="12739"><code data-reactid="12740">"challenge"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="12741">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12742">
               <li data-reactid="12743">

                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12745 -->block, challenge, whitelist
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="12746">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12747"><strong data-reactid="12748">match</strong><br data-reactid="12749"><small data-reactid="12750"><em data-reactid="12751"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="12752">
              <div data-reactid="12753">
               <p>Whether to match all search requirements or at least one (any)</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="12754">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="12755"><code data-reactid="12756">"all"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="12757">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12758">
               <li data-reactid="12759">default value: all</li>
               <li data-reactid="12760">
                <!-- react-text: 12761 -->valid values: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12762 -->any, all
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="12763">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12764"><strong data-reactid="12765">scope_type</strong><br data-reactid="12766"><small data-reactid="12767"><em data-reactid="12768"></em></small></td>

              </div></td>

              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12775">

            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="12779">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12780"><strong data-reactid="12781">configuration_value</strong><br data-reactid="12782"><small data-reactid="12783"><em data-reactid="12784">
                <!-- react-text: 12785 -->string
                <!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="12786">
              <div data-reactid="12787">
               <p>Search by IP, range, or country code</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="12788">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="12789"><code data-reactid="12790">"1.2.3.4"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="12791">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12792">
               <li data-reactid="12793">
                <!-- react-text: 12794 -->notes: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12795 -->IP is a single IPv4 address. IP range has a subnet of /16 or /24. Country code is an ISO 2-letter country code.
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="12796">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12797"><strong data-reactid="12798">order</strong><br data-reactid="12799"><small data-reactid="12800"><em data-reactid="12801"></em></small></td>

              <div data-reactid="12803">

              </div>

              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="12812">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12813"><strong data-reactid="12814">page</strong><br data-reactid="12815"><small data-reactid="12816"><em data-reactid="12817">

               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="12822"><code data-reactid="12823">1</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="12824">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12825">
               <li data-reactid="12826">default value: 1</li>
               <li data-reactid="12827">
                <!-- react-text: 12828 -->min value
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12829 -->:
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12830 -->1
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="12831">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12832"><strong data-reactid="12833">per_page</strong><br data-reactid="12834"><small data-reactid="12835"><em data-reactid="12836">
                <!-- react-text: 12837 -->number

              </div>

               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="12841"><code data-reactid="12842">50</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="12843">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12844">
               <li data-reactid="12845">default value: 50</li>
               <li data-reactid="12846">
                <!-- react-text: 12847 -->min value
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12848 -->:
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12849 -->5
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
               <li data-reactid="12850">
                <!-- react-text: 12851 -->max value
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12852 -->:
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12853 -->100
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="12854">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12855"><strong data-reactid="12856">configuration_target</strong><br data-reactid="12857"><small data-reactid="12858"><em data-reactid="12859"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="12860">
              <div data-reactid="12861">
               <p>The rule configuration target</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="12862">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="12863"><code data-reactid="12864">"ip"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="12865">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12866">
               <li data-reactid="12867">
                <!-- react-text: 12868 -->valid values: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12869 -->ip, ip_range, country
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="12870">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12871"><strong data-reactid="12872">direction</strong><br data-reactid="12873"><small data-reactid="12874"><em data-reactid="12875"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="12876">
              <div data-reactid="12877">
               <p>Direction to order rules</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="12878">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="12879"><code data-reactid="12880">"desc"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="12881">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12882">
               <li data-reactid="12883">
                <!-- react-text: 12884 -->valid values: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 12885 -->asc, desc
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>
        </div>
