       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="13115">
        <a class="anchor2" id="firewall-access-rule-for-a-zone-delete-access-rule" data-reactid="13116">firewall-access-rule-for-a-zone-delete-access-rule</a>
        <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="13117">
         <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="13118"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="13119">DELETE</span>
          <!-- react-text: 13120 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 13121 -->Delete access rule
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 13122 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 13123 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="13124">
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="13125"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="13126">free</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="13127"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="13128"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="13129">pro</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="13130"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="13131"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="13132">business</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="13133"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="13134"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="13135">enterprise</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="13136"></div></li>
          </ul></h3>
         <div data-reactid="13137">
          <p>Remove an access rule so it is no longer evaluated during requests. Optionally, specify how to delete rules that match the mode and configuration across all other zones that this zone owner manages. 'none' is the default, and will only delete this rule. 'basic' will delete rules that match the same mode and configuration. 'aggressive' will delete rules that match the same configuration.</p> 
         </div>
         <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="13138">
          <!-- react-text: 13139 -->DELETE
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 13140 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 13141 -->zones/:zone_id/firewall/access_rules/rules/:identifier
          <!-- /react-text --></pre>
        </div>
        <div data-reactid="13142">
         <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="13143"><em data-reactid="13144">Optional</em>
          <!-- react-text: 13145 --> parameters
          <!-- /react-text --></h4>
         <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="13146">
          <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="13147">
           <thead data-reactid="13148">
            <tr data-reactid="13149">
             <td data-reactid="13150">
              <!-- react-text: 13151 -->Name 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="13152">/type</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="13153">
              <!-- react-text: 13154 -->Description 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="13155">/example</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="13156">Constraints</td>
            </tr>
           </thead>
           <tbody data-reactid="13157">
            <tr data-reactid="13158">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="13159"><strong data-reactid="13160">cascade</strong><br data-reactid="13161"><small data-reactid="13162"><em data-reactid="13163"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="13164">
              <div data-reactid="13165">
               <p>The level to attempt to delete rules defined on other zones that are similar to this rule</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="13166">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="13167"><code data-reactid="13168">"none"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="13169">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="13170">
               <li data-reactid="13171">default value: none</li>
               <li data-reactid="13172">
                <!-- react-text: 13173 -->valid values: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 13174 -->none, basic, aggressive
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="13175">
         <!-- react-text: 13176 -->cURL 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="13177">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="13178">
         <pre data-reactid="13179">curl -X DELETE "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/firewall/access_rules/rules/92f17202ed8bd63d69a66b86a49a8f6b" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="691c1a0c1b290c11080419050c470a0604">[email&nbsp;protected]</a>" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"cascade":"none"}'</pre>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="13180">
         <!-- react-text: 13181 -->Response 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="13182">(example)</small></h5>

  }

             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="13466">
              <div data-reactid="13467">
               <p>The default action that will be taken for rules under the firewall package.</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="13468">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="13469"><code data-reactid="13470">"challenge"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="13471">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="13472">
               <li data-reactid="13473">default value: challenge</li>
               <li data-reactid="13474">
                <!-- react-text: 13475 -->valid values: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 13476 -->simulate, block, challenge
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="13477">
         <!-- react-text: 13478 -->cURL 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="13479">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="13480">
         <pre data-reactid="13481">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/firewall/waf/packages/a25a9a7e9c00afc1fb2e0245519d725b" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="5025233522103528313d203c357e333f3d">[email&nbsp;protected]</a>" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"sensitivity":"high","action_mode":"challenge"}'</pre>
        </div>

               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="13784"><code data-reactid="13785">"on"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="13786">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="13787">
               <li data-reactid="13788">default value: on</li>
               <li data-reactid="13789">
                <!-- react-text: 13790 -->valid values: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 13791 -->on, off
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="13792">
         <!-- react-text: 13793 -->cURL 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="13794">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="13795">
         <pre data-reactid="13796">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/firewall/waf/packages/a25a9a7e9c00afc1fb2e0245519d725b/groups/de677e5818985db1285d0e80225f06e5" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="3144425443715449505c415d541f525e5c">[email&nbsp;protected]</a>" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"mode":"on"}'</pre>
        </div>

            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="14099"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="14100"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="14101">business</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="14102"></div></li>
           <li class="plan false" data-reactid="14103"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="14104">enterprise</h6>
            <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="14105"></div></li>
          </ul></h3>
         <div data-reactid="14106">
          <p>Update the action the rule will perform if triggered on the zone</p> 
         </div>
         <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="14107">
          <!-- react-text: 14108 -->PATCH
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 14109 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 14110 -->zones/:zone_id/firewall/waf/packages/:package_id/rules/:identifier
          <!-- /react-text --></pre>
        </div>
        <div data-reactid="14111">
         <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="14112"><em data-reactid="14113">Optional</em>
          <!-- react-text: 14114 --> parameters
          <!-- /react-text --></h4>
         <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="14115">
          <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="14116">
           <thead data-reactid="14117">
            <tr data-reactid="14118">
             <td data-reactid="14119">
              <!-- react-text: 14120 -->Name 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="14121">/type</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="14122">
              <!-- react-text: 14123 -->Description 
              <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="14124">/example</small></td>
             <td data-reactid="14125">Constraints</td>
            </tr>
           </thead>
           <tbody data-reactid="14126">
            <tr data-reactid="14127">
             <td class="param-name" data-reactid="14128"><strong data-reactid="14129">mode</strong><br data-reactid="14130"><small data-reactid="14131"><em data-reactid="14132"></em></small></td>
             <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="14133">
              <div data-reactid="14134">
               <p>The mode to use when the rule is triggered. Value is restricted based on the allowed_modes of the rule</p> 
              </div>
              <div data-reactid="14135">
               <small class="example-code" data-reactid="14136"><code data-reactid="14137">"on"</code></small>
              </div></td>
             <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="14138">
              <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="14139">
               <li data-reactid="14140">
                <!-- react-text: 14141 -->valid values: 
                <!-- /react-text -->
                <!-- react-text: 14142 -->default, disable, simulate, block, challenge, on, off
                <!-- /react-text --></li>
              </ul></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </div>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="14143">
         <!-- react-text: 14144 -->cURL 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="14145">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="14146">
         <pre data-reactid="14147">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/firewall/waf/packages/a25a9a7e9c00afc1fb2e0245519d725b/rules/f939de3be84e66e757adcdcb87908023" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="f683859384b6938e979b869a93d895999b">[email&nbsp;protected]</a>" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"mode":"on"}'</pre>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="14148">
         <!-- react-text: 14149 -->Response 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="14150">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="14151">
         <pre data-reactid="14152">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [
    {}
  ],
  "messages": [
    {}
  ],
  "result": {
    "id": "f939de3be84e66e757adcdcb87908023",
    "description": "SQL injection prevention for SELECT statements",
    "priority": 5,
    "group": {
      "id": "de677e5818985db1285d0e80225f06e5",
      "name": "Project Honey Pot"
    },
    "package_id": "a25a9a7e9c00afc1fb2e0245519d725b",
    "allowed_modes": [
      "on",
      "off"
    ],
    "mode": "on"
  }
}</pre>
        </div>
       </section>
      </article>
      <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="14153">
       <header data-reactid="14154">
        <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="user-agent-blocking-rules" data-reactid="14155"></div>
        <h2 data-reactid="14156">User-Agent Blocking Rules</h2>
        <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="14157">Perform access control when matching the exact UserAgent reported by the client</h4>
        <div data-reactid="14158">
         <p>Four access control mechanisms can be defined within a rule to help manage traffic from particular clients. This will enable you to customise the access to your site. The four mechanisms are: -</p> 
         <p><code>block</code> - Blocks the request immediately</p> 
         <p><code>challenge</code> - Send a challenge to the originator of the request</p> 
         <p><code>js_challenge</code> - Send a JavaScript based challenge to the originator of the request</p> 
         <p><code>whitelist</code> - Allow the request to continue</p> 
        </div>
       </header>
       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="14159">
        <a class="anchor" id="user-agent-blocking-rules-properties" data-reactid="14160">user-agent-blocking-rules</a>
        <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="14161">
         <h4 data-reactid="14162">
          <!-- react-text: 14163 -->Object definition
          <!-- /react-text --></h4>
         <p data-reactid="14164">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
         <p data-reactid="14165"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="14166"><span class="verb" data-reactid="14167">Show</span>
           <!-- react-text: 14168 --> 
           <!-- /react-text -->
           <!-- react-text: 14169 -->definition
           <!-- /react-text --></a></p>
        </header>
       </section>
       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="14170">

        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="14407">
         <!-- react-text: 14408 -->cURL 
         <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="14409">(example)</small></h5>
        <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="14410">
         <pre data-reactid="14411">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/firewall/ua_rules" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="b0c5c3d5c2f0d5c8d1ddc0dcd59ed3dfdd">[email&nbsp;protected]</a>" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"id":"372e67954025e0ba6aaa6d586b9e0b59","paused":false,"description":"Prevent access from abusive clients identified by this UserAgent to mitigate DDoS attack","mode":"js_challenge","configuration":{"target":"ua","value":"Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_12_5) AppleWebKit/603.2.4 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/10.1.1 Safari/603.2.4"}}'</pre>
        </div>
        <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="14412">
         <!-- react-text: 14413 -->Response

      <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="14690">
       <header data-reactid="14691">
        <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="zone-lockdown" data-reactid="14692"></div>
        <h2 data-reactid="14693">Zone Lockdown</h2>
        <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="14694">Lock access to URLs in this zone to only permitted addresses or address ranges.</h4>
        <div data-reactid="14695">
         <p>Ensure that part(s) of your site can only be accessed from permitted IP addresses or IP ranges. Zone Lockdown allows you to define one or more URLs (with wildcard matching on the domain or path) that will only permit access if the request originates from an IP address that matches a safelist of one or more IP addresses and/or IP ranges.</p> 
        </div>
       </header>
       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="14696">
        <a class="anchor" id="zone-lockdown-properties" data-reactid="14697">zone-lockdown</a>
        <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="14698">
         <h4 data-reactid="14699">
          <!-- react-text: 14700 -->Object definition
          <!-- /react-text --></h4>
         <p data-reactid="14701">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
         <p data-reactid="14702"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="14703"><span class="verb" data-reactid="14704">Show</span>
           <!-- react-text: 14705 --> 
           <!-- /react-text -->
           <!-- react-text: 14706 -->definition
           <!-- /react-text --></a></p>
        </header>
       </section>
       <section class="modunit" data-reactid="14707">
        <a class="anchor2" id="zone-lockdown-list-lockdown-rules" data-reactid="14708">zone-lockdown-list-lockdown-rules</a>
        <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="14709">
         <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="14710"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="14711">GET</span>
          <!-- react-text: 14712 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 14713 -->List lockdown rules
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 14714 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <!-- react-text: 14715 --> 
          <!-- /react-text -->
          <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="14716">

              </div>

              <div data-reactid="14867">

     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"id":"372e67954025e0ba6aaa6d586b9e0b59","paused":false,"description":"Restrict access to these endpoints to requests from a known IP address","urls":["api.mysite.com/some/endpoint*"],"configurations":[{"target":"ip","value":"1.2.3.4"}]}'</pre>
